title: PROJECT: Hoodie (Quest Edition) - Redeemed but can't order
body:
I completed the quest last night and redeemed it tonight. The issue I have is that I went to order it but after getting onto Paypal I had to deal with dogs going crazy. I came back after a while after finally settling them down and Paypal had refreshed so didn't have the order.
I then went to order the hoodie again and couldn't because it said it was already redeemed. It isn't in my shopping cart or order history and I have checked my Paypal and it hasn't come up as paid through it or in that history.

I have seen a few other posts about this issue and should be rectified asap.

I can provide screenshots if it helps.

replies.body: Submit a support ticket and if they ask for a picture or something then please do so. But since I'm a average summoner like you I can't really help much from here. (oh btw, more the picture you have to show them then the better chances they will solve things quickly for you)
